pages.text: $(li)The Blast Furnace is a variant of the Furnace that unlock an specific list of Smelting recipes.
$(li)If this block is placed near of a Villager without a job, it will be turned into a Armorer.
$(li)To use it, you have to insert fuel like Coal or Blaze Rods in the second slot. Then, you have to add the item to Smelt in the first slot.
